item.description:
Register for a mini-retreat on June 11, 2011 from 2 to 8 pm at Still Waters Retreat Center.

2-4 pm: Swimming, boating, hiking, relaxing in nature by a 10-acre pond

4-6 pm: Living Foods Uncooking Class: Coconut Soup and Thai Spring Rolls.

6-7 pm: A Delicious Dinner

7-8 pm: Meditation Workshop: Anatomy of the Breath - Find out why Taoist breathwork is so effective in preventing and curing most health issues. We can cultivate qi, or vital energy, within the body simply by learning breath control techniques.

Pricing: $65 for the half-day, or $50 if registered by June 1.

Mail your registration form with check payable to:
Christine Ucich, Instructor
SunDo-Taoist Main Center
45 South Main Street, Suite 090
West Hartford, CT 06107

For those interested in attending the entire weekend retreat, please visit the website to download a registration form...

http://www.stillwaterspond.com/retreats.html
item.why: Spend a relaxing day by the pond and enjoy a delicious dinner.
item.name: Taoist Yoga Mini-Retreat on June 11
